name: Mass Fidelity
tag_list: audio, software, tech, start-up, stereos, smart-sound-systems, streaming-music, content-management
overview:
Mass Fidelity is a Canadian based audio tech start up. A community of audiophiles, designers, and engineers who are united by their passion for music. Our approach is conversational. We are steadfastly focused on experimenting with unique technologies and resources to fashion unparalleled sound systems.

Mass Fidelity was formed to ensure collective progress and collaborative change in the field of consumer audio technology. R&D efforts are focused on Design, Sound quality, and Content management.

Simplicity in design and dexterity in function make Mass Fidelity systems unlike anything else you’ve seen or heard. They’re about intelligently facilitating the aggregation of all your digital music collections and sources, allowing you to engage your music in a friendly way across all the devices you use on a daily basis.
